comment: Two ways to express that a function has a limit. (The expression ` ( ( ~~>u `` S ) `` F ) ` is sometimes useful as a shorthand for "the unique limit of the function ` F ` "). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jul-2017.)
